entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:06 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: SSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or rain mixed with ice pellets. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
